title: Project-Based Learning (PjBL) Model Development for Vocational Schools: Application to GMAW Welding Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of metallic materials and introductory welding techniques
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course for current professionals, reflecting industry demands, utilizing smartphone-based learning materials and workshop spaces.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to accurately apply GMAW welding processes between metal plates at 1F, 2F, and 3F positions.
Learners will be able to self/peer-evaluate outputs using welding quality assessment criteria.
Learners will be able to perform welding tasks while complying with industrial safety regulations.

resources: GMAW (Gas Metal Arc Welding) Practice Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
